wiki_section_title: Draft

wiki_section_text: 

intro: The 1948 BAA draft was the second annual draft of the Basketball Association of America (BAA), which later became the National Basketball Association (NBA). The draft was held on May 10, 1948, before to the 1948-49 season. In this draft, eight BAA teams along with four teams who moved from the National Basketball League, took turns selecting amateur U.S. college basketball players.

qa.question: Who started the BAA team that in 1948 originally drafted the player that was later named NBA coach of the year in 1966 ?

nq_99170_12.Answer Analysis: The answer is Ned Irish, indicating he is the founder of the relevant BAA team.
